title: Bioinspired photo-driven hydrogen evolution systems based on hydrogenases and their mimics
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4709-4751
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00423J, Review Article
Rahat Gupta, Amlan K. Pal
Photocatalytic HER using hydrogenases and their mimics in conjugation with artificial photosensitizers like metal complexes, dyes, and semiconductors is showcased. These systems exhibit robust and sustainable solar energy-to-H2 conversion.
